name: QrPngEyeOptions
summary: Styling overrides for QR finder (eye) patterns.

properties.name: UseFrame
properties.summary: Gets or sets whether to draw each eye as a single frame (outer ring + inner dot).

properties.name: FrameStyle
properties.summary: Gets or sets the eye frame style when CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngEyeOptions.UseFrame is enabled.

properties.name: OuterShape
properties.summary: Gets or sets the outer (7x7) eye module shape.

properties.name: InnerShape
properties.summary: Gets or sets the inner (3x3) eye module shape.

properties.name: OuterScale
properties.summary: Gets or sets the scale of the outer modules inside their cells (0.1..1.0).

properties.name: InnerScale
properties.summary: Gets or sets the scale of the inner modules inside their cells (0.1..1.0).

properties.name: OuterCornerRadiusPx
properties.summary: Gets or sets the corner radius for outer modules (pixels).

properties.name: InnerCornerRadiusPx
properties.summary: Gets or sets the corner radius for inner modules (pixels).

properties.name: OuterColor
properties.summary: Optional outer eye color override.

properties.name: OuterColors
properties.summary: Optional per-eye outer colors (TopLeft, TopRight, BottomLeft).

properties.name: InnerColor
properties.summary: Optional inner eye color override.

properties.name: InnerColors
properties.summary: Optional per-eye inner colors (TopLeft, TopRight, BottomLeft).

properties.name: OuterGradient
properties.summary: Optional gradient for the outer frame.

properties.name: OuterGradients
properties.summary: Optional per-eye outer gradients (TopLeft, TopRight, BottomLeft).

properties.name: InnerGradient
properties.summary: Optional gradient for the inner dot.

properties.name: InnerGradients
properties.summary: Optional per-eye inner gradients (TopLeft, TopRight, BottomLeft).

properties.name: GlowRadiusPx
properties.summary: Optional glow radius in pixels when CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngEyeOptions.FrameStyle is CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngEyeFrameStyle.Glow. A value of 0 uses a reasonable default based on module size.

properties.name: GlowColor
properties.summary: Optional glow color override. Defaults to the outer eye color.

properties.name: GlowAlpha
properties.summary: Maximum glow alpha (0..255) when CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngEyeOptions.FrameStyle is CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngEyeFrameStyle.Glow.

properties.name: SparkleCount
properties.summary: Optional sparkle count drawn around the eyes on the canvas.

properties.name: SparkleRadiusPx
properties.summary: Sparkle radius in pixels.

properties.name: SparkleSpreadPx
properties.summary: How far sparkles can extend beyond the eye ring (in pixels).

properties.name: SparkleColor
properties.summary: Sparkle color override. Defaults to the outer eye color.

properties.name: SparkleSeed
properties.summary: Random seed for sparkle placement. Use 0 to auto-randomize per render.

properties.name: SparkleProtectQrArea
properties.summary: When true (default), sparkles do not draw inside the QR area.

properties.name: SparkleAllowOnQrBackground
properties.summary: When false (default), sparkles render only when a canvas is enabled.

properties.name: AccentRingCount
properties.summary: Optional accent ring count drawn around the eyes on the canvas.

properties.name: AccentRingThicknessPx
properties.summary: Accent ring stroke thickness in pixels.

properties.name: AccentRingSpreadPx
properties.summary: How far accent rings can extend beyond the eye ring (in pixels).

properties.name: AccentRingJitterPx
properties.summary: Small jitter applied to ring radius (in pixels).

properties.name: AccentRingColor
properties.summary: Accent ring color override. Defaults to the outer eye color with a softer alpha.

properties.name: AccentRingSeed
properties.summary: Random seed for accent ring placement. Use 0 to auto-randomize per render.

properties.name: AccentRingProtectQrArea
properties.summary: When true (default), accent rings do not draw inside the QR area.

properties.name: AccentRingAllowOnQrBackground
properties.summary: When false (default), accent rings render only when a canvas is enabled.

properties.name: AccentRayCount
properties.summary: Optional accent ray count drawn around the eyes on the canvas.

properties.name: AccentRayLengthPx
properties.summary: Accent ray length in pixels.

properties.name: AccentRayThicknessPx
properties.summary: Accent ray stroke thickness in pixels.

properties.name: AccentRaySpreadPx
properties.summary: How far accent rays can start beyond the eye ring (in pixels).

properties.name: AccentRayJitterPx
properties.summary: Small jitter applied to ray start radius (in pixels).

properties.name: AccentRayLengthJitterPx
properties.summary: Small jitter applied to ray length (in pixels).

properties.name: AccentRayColor
properties.summary: Accent ray color override. Defaults to the outer eye color with a softer alpha.

properties.name: AccentRaySeed
properties.summary: Random seed for accent ray placement. Use 0 to auto-randomize per render.

properties.name: AccentRayProtectQrArea
properties.summary: When true (default), accent rays do not draw inside the QR area.

properties.name: AccentRayAllowOnQrBackground
properties.summary: When false (default), accent rays render only when a canvas is enabled.

properties.name: AccentStripeCount
properties.summary: Optional accent stripe count drawn around the eyes on the canvas. Stripes are short tangential strokes that hug the eye perimeter.

properties.name: AccentStripeLengthPx
properties.summary: Accent stripe length in pixels.

properties.name: AccentStripeThicknessPx
properties.summary: Accent stripe stroke thickness in pixels.

properties.name: AccentStripeSpreadPx
properties.summary: How far accent stripes can extend beyond the eye ring (in pixels).

properties.name: AccentStripeJitterPx
properties.summary: Small jitter applied to stripe radius (in pixels).

properties.name: AccentStripeLengthJitterPx
properties.summary: Small jitter applied to stripe length (in pixels).

properties.name: AccentStripeColor
properties.summary: Accent stripe color override. Defaults to the outer eye color with a softer alpha.

properties.name: AccentStripeSeed
properties.summary: Random seed for accent stripe placement. Use 0 to auto-randomize per render.

properties.name: AccentStripeProtectQrArea
properties.summary: When true (default), accent stripes do not draw inside the QR area.

properties.name: AccentStripeAllowOnQrBackground
properties.summary: When false (default), accent stripes render only when a canvas is enabled.
